item.title: Graffiti sprayed on wall and street boxes at 42 Hillyard street SW9., 1st December
item.description:
I like to report graffiti sprayed on the walls and street boxes at 42 Hillyard street SW9. The graffiti is at the lower end of Hillyard Street and has been there for over three months. Please could you remove it.

item.title: 6 full big bins, near main entrance of block of flats 42-57, 1st December
item.description:
The 6 full big bins were left by the entrance of flats from Friday 28/11/2025. At night wind been blowing trash around and the smell is unbearable. Kindly assist this not to happen again. Regards.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Galleon Close, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytip, 1st December
item.description:
The usual Monday morning fly tip on gallon close se78sy it's on the grass on the first corner . This is definitely a resident as it looks like someone has a clear out of rubbish, dumps it here rather then putting in their bins .
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gallon Close, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wet slippery floor damp conditions, 1st December
item.description:
An accident has occurred on slippery floor resulting in serious injuries. Ambulance called. This is a problem Southwark council is aware of as a warning paper sign was stuck on the wall for some years. Regardless of this notice the stairs are extremely dangerous in these conditions. This needs urgent action.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Domett Close, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
